description:
The **typography** component enables the management of font typeface and size based
upon text or heading class used. Different type of sizes and fonts can be used to convey
different level of importance.

List styles are control with a class name modifier for the corresponding style option.
name: Typography
usage:
It is recommended to use these typographic classes with the appropriate semantic HTML element for the
situation you are using them in and apply either the `.text-*` or `.heading-*` class needed to adjust
the font size and style.

Font sizes are defined in REM units, which are relaive to the base font size for your application. To
update the sizing you can override the individual classes or update the font size on your `<body>`
element in you application's main CSS file.
